name: Other non-science and engineering research doctorate recipients, statistical profile by sex and major field of doctorate: 2022
description: Other non-science and engineering research doctorate recipients, statistical profile by sex and major field of doctorate: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_other_non_science_and_engineering_fields
variableMeasured.description: All Other Non Science And Engineering Fields

notes: Due to rounding, percentages may not sum to 100. Beginning in 2021, a modified version of the 2020 Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) codes was used in the survey data collection, and new broad, major, and detailed fields are used in tables reporting data from 2021 to the present; see the field list in table A-4. Therefore, the field of doctorate data prior to 2021 may not be comparable to subsequent years. For more information, see the "Technical Notes" and the SED 2021 Taxonomy Changes Working Paper (available at https://ncses.nsf.gov/pubs/ncses23200).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
